r.d: ev provides inteface to libev library - high performance full-featured event loop written in C.
r.n: Fix: get_property_ptr_ptr for zval properties was not supoprted. See http://old.nabble.com/Can%27t-get-zval-write-property-handler-working-for-%2B%2B------%2B%2B-and-other-operators-to34843859.html Fix: check for attempts to bind a signal to different event loops
